description: Checks if the privileges DEBUG or ATTACH DEBUGGER assigned to any user for any object in the system.

queries.name: q_prod_users_with_debug_roles
queries.sql: SELECT count(*) as COUNT FROM GRANTED_PRIVILEGES WHERE PRIVILEGE='DEBUG' OR PRIVILEGE='ATTACH DEBUGGER'

actions.description: At least one user has the DEBUG or ATTACH DEBUGGER privilege. It is recommended that no user or role in a production database has this privilege.
